name: Dragonic
description: Bearers of this ancestry inherit the power of dragons, increasing their attack and resistance to fire.
effect: Increases attack by 20% and reduces fire damage by 30%

name: Elemental
description: This ancestry connects the bearer to the elements, increasing their ability to deal magical damage.

name: Sanguine
description: Bearers of this ancestry grow stronger based on the damage they deal, at the cost of their own health.
effect: Deals 15% additional damage but loses 5% health per attack

name: Celestial
description: Blessed by the gods, bearers of this ancestry gain healing and purification abilities.
effect: Increases healing received by 30% and purifies negative effects every 3 actions

name: Shadow Blade
description: This ancestry immerses the bearer in shadows, increasing their dodge and critical hit chances.
effect: Increases critical hit and dodge chances by 20%

name: Runic
description: Bearers of runes master ancient energy, enhancing their defense and the duration of magical effects.
effect: Increases defense by 15% and extends beneficial effects by 2 turns

name: Beastial
description: Heirs of the wild, these bearers increase their speed and physical power as the battle progresses.
effect: Gains +2 attack and +1 speed per turn
